content.rendered:
Our BBQ cleaning techniques will help refresh your outdoor cooking setup.

Our completely environmentally friendly process involves soaking any removable items in the heat tank containing our specialised solution in the back of the technicians van. The cavity of the BBQ and both sides of the hood are given a degrease and clean. The BBQ is polished, checked and the fat absorber is replaced.

We are dedicated to achieving amazing results and exceeding your expectations. For more information or to arrange a clean, just contact us today. We are happy to clean both your oven and BBQ on the same day or attend your home on different days to complete the job.
